article.title: Release Notes
article.para: This document summarizes the significant changes since the 2.0.5 release.
There's nothing significant about the order in which the changes are listed except that I usually try to put the big ones near the top..

listitem.para: Added: support for passing the secondary documents back from the DocBook processing pipeline.
Added role attribute to verbatim classes.
Added a second pass over slides to remove “reveal” classes from notes. With reveal classes in the notes, the JavaScript was getting confused about slide transitions.
Tinkered with dist target so that the distribution zips have a top-level, versioned directory.
Removed xspec results from the distributions; they're not used at the moment.
